notes: Seed content plan for Payroll for Crews. Each item can become a blog post.

pillars.name: Payroll Setup and Compliance
pillars.description: Certified payroll, multi state payroll, switching providers, and W2 and 1099 compliance on public and private jobs.

pillars.name: Time Tracking and Job Costing
pillars.description: Time tracking rules, job costing labor by job, and getting off paper timesheets for small crews.

pillars.name: Payroll Mistakes and Fixes
pillars.description: Common overtime and payroll workflow mistakes for crew based businesses and how to fix them.

pillars.name: AI and Modern Tools for Crews
pillars.description: AI accountants and modern tools that help small crew based businesses run payroll and track profit.
